ygData.subject: Re: old but still strong.
ygData.msgSnippet: The post between Veratis and Grizzletron  was supposed to have taken place a while ago but Proto hasn t posted in a while so I guess we can work with this. Ice

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

The post between Veratis and Grizzletron  was supposed to have taken place a
while ago but Proto hasn't posted in a while so I guess we can work with
this.

Ice and Mustex entered the lab, Before Ice could speak Mustex made his
comment. Veratis remained calm turning to the new visitor. "Megaton was an
unfortunate accident but as always in the name of science those things
happen." He quickly changed the subject turning to Ice. "Since he's with you
I take it he's a friend."

Ice transformed to her polar bear form and stepped forward. "I found him
near the alliance base, He was to close to where I was so I decided to get
away before we were spotted by any Alliance troops." The mutant scanned her
new associate and still saw no reason to question him. "I'm not sensing any
agressive tendancies from him so I guess he's safe." She turned seeing the
frozen bot in the lab. "What happened to him?" she asked.

"His gears just stopped working." The old scientist replied, "We were having
a little chat and suddenly he stopped responding. I'm thinking of putting
him in my study as a form of modern art."

Grizzltron stood perfectly still, the same pose he was in for about a
hundred posts.
----- Original Message -----
From: <dewboy30816@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, July 29, 2001 3:33 PM
Subject: Re: old but still strong.


Mustex:THEN WHY THE FREAK DID YOU CREATE MEGATON! That's right! I
know! Somewhere in your security something slipped!
